messages.title: A Strong Champion for the local community
messages.content: Mary's priorities include: Fighting against a 3rd runway & reduction in night flights, getting more police on the street, delivering permanent apprenticeships in every school, cleaning up Brentford to make it a destination place to go.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting against a 3rd runway & reduction in night flights.
Getting more police on the street.
Delivering permanent apprenticeships in every school.
Cleaning up Brentford to make it a destination place to go.
